etphoneshome.entities.enemies

Class Scientist

  • java.lang.Object
    • etphoneshome.entities.actor.Actor
      • etphoneshome.entities.enemies.Enemy
        • etphoneshome.entities.enemies.Scientist

  • public class Scientist
extends Enemy
    This class is used for the Scientist type enemy. It is a derived class from the Enemy class
